me wasara hathalis paha thula apata ahima wi giya jiwitha yanu rata wenuwen wu wedanawe awasan thora ganimaki .maw bima wenuwena wu premaya wisin aragala bhumiya thula diw puda karanu labime iranama upan maw bima wisin thindu kara denu labuye ayida yana prashnaya nawatha nawathath nagiya yuthu wemu .pararthakami shakthimath jawasampanna tharunyaya sathu janamaya hakiyawan urumakarawaku nomathiwa mawath wala aluwi yaddi awasana apata ithiri wi aththe aathmarthakami kata wachala kiyawana durwala nayakayin pirisaki .mega polis yanu wishala polisiyak lesa wisthara karana aanduwema janatha niyojithayin thabiya yuthu ule usa pramanaya wenarataka nam janathawa thiranaya karanu atha eheth heta dawase nawathath madhya idiriye mewani charitha digin digatama deshapalanaya gana dodawanne jathiye kawara awasanawakatadayi nodanimu
